mapper.sql: t_product_item . id , t_product_item.parent_id AS parentId, t_product_item.child_id AS childId, t_product_item.note, t_product_item.create_time AS createTime, t_product_item.update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT t_product_item.* FROM t_product_item WHERE t_product_item.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_product_item.id

SELECT
FROM t_product_item
WHERE 1=1
AND t_product_item.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_product_item.parent_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.parentId},'%')
AND t_product_item.child_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.childId},'%')
AND t_product_item.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_product_item.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_product_item.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_product_item.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_product_item.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY update_time DESC , create_time DESC
